photos.heading: Exercise for better flexbility
photos.description: Because stretching may aggravate an existing injury, if you're injured, you should consult an athletic trainer or physical therapist about an appropriate flexibility program.

photos.heading: Quad exercise
photos.description: The squat is one of the best exercises to tone legs.

photos.heading: Side plank
photos.description: The side plank is another great exercise that can be used to lose the love handles.
